channel.title: Making safe zones
channel.description:
Hey I'm using PimpScape and messing around and I am trying to find a safezone making tut. But all I see on the tutorial list is premade areas. Heres the code thing.
public boolean nonWild() { if((absX >= 3249 && absX <= 3258 && absY >= 3438 && absY <=3431 ) || (absX >= 3249 && absX <= 3260 && absY >=3435 && absY <=3437 ) || (absX >= 3249 && absX <= 3253 && absY >=3431 && absY <=3437 ) || (absX >=3250 && absX <=3257 && absY >=3419 && absY <=3423 ) ||(absX >=3250 && absX <=3257 && absY >=3419 && absY <=3423 )||
But I want to add lumbridge area.

item.title: Making safe zones
item.dc:creator: @TheFlamingThunder TheFlamingThunder
item.description:
@TheFlamingThunder wrote:

I Think I See The Problem…Maybe (I Never Done This Before But I’ll Try) You have to put the Lumbridge Coords in the absX and absY Try it…

                           Sincerely,
                                 TheFlamingThunder

Read full topic

item.title: Making safe zones
item.dc:creator: @Spit_It_Out Spit It Out
item.description:
@Spit_It_Out wrote:

Hey I’m using PimpScape and messing around and I am trying to find a safezone making tut. But all I see on the tutorial list is premade areas. Heres the code thing.

public boolean nonWild() {
if((absX >= 3249 && absX <= 3258 && absY >= 3438 && absY <=3431 ) || (absX >= 3249 && absX <= 3260 && absY >=3435 && absY <=3437 ) || (absX >= 3249 && absX <= 3253 && absY >=3431 && absY <=3437 ) || (absX >=3250 && absX <=3257 && absY >=3419 && absY <=3423 ) ||(absX >=3250 && absX <=3257 && absY >=3419 && absY <=3423 )||

But I want to add lumbridge area.

Read full topic
